competencies.statement: Demonstrate knowledge of healthcare simulation
verificationMethods: Complete a course that reviews standards, core competencies, and best practices in healthcare simulation

competencies.statement: Demonstrate technical ability to maintain and utilize simulation equipment
verificationMethods: Return demonstration of turning on and off simulators

competencies.statement: Conduct learning needs assessment
verificationMethods: Gather data and present at ERC

competencies.statement: Demonstrate scheduling of simulation lab
verificationMethods: Return demonstration of scheduling software

competencies.statement: Review Simulation Dictionary
verificationMethods: Return demonstration of running simulator program during healthcare simulation

competencies.statement: Analyze data and present at ERC
verificationMethods: Present to education department and ERC procedure for scheduling simulation events in the simulation lab

competencies.statement: Review Healthcare simulation standards of best practice
verificationMethods: Identify resources for troubleshooting simulation equipment

competencies.statement: Shadow simulation technician at another facility

categories.name: Coordination of Allied Health Education
categories.note: Will include but not limited to EMS, respiratory, PT/OT, radiology, and laboratory departments

competencies.statement: Demonstrates knowledge of adult learning principles
verificationMethods: Complete a course covering adult learning theory

competencies.statement: Facilitates formal and informal learning activities
verificationMethods: Submit 2 peer reviews of facilitation of learning activities

competencies.statement: Conduct learning needs assessment
verificationMethods: Gather data and present at ERC

competencies.statement: Demonstrate understanding of experiential learning
verificationMethods: Provide an example of using experiential learning in education activities

competencies.statement: Review Adult Learning Theory
verificationMethods: Analyze data and present at ERC

competencies.statement: Review androgogy
Understand team dynamics
verificationMethods: Attend department staff meeting and PDS meeting
Meet with each member of the education department

competencies.statement: Demonstrated the ability to write a professional email
verificationMethods: Submit 2 examples of professional emails to team

categories.name: Communication with Allied Health Staff and Leadership

competencies.statement: Demonstrate active listening
verificationMethods: Peer evaluation

competencies.statement: Effective questioning and feedback
verificationMethods: Peer evaluation

competencies.statement: Utilizes emotional intelligence
verificationMethods: Provide examples of emotional intelligence: self-awareness, motivation, self-regulation, social awareness and empathy, social skills

categories.name: Communication with users of the simulation

competencies.statement: Demonstrate customer service skills
verificationMethods: Provide examples of being approachable
Provide examples of being accessible

competencies.statement: Demonstrate conflict resolution skills
verificationMethods: Submit an exemplar of conflict resolution

competencies.statement: Demonstrates establishing clear expectations, fostering open dialogue, and maintaining regular and proactive communication with vendors
verificationMethods: Provide examples of communication with vendors

competencies.statement: Maintaining simulation lab equipment to ensure ability to function
verificationMethods: Shadow simulation technician at another facility
Maintain an inventory of all equipment for simulation lab
Create an inventory of all simulation equipment

competencies.statement: Demonstrate what equipment is in working order and what needs to be repaired
Demonstrate how to contact company technical support to troubleshoot equipment
Demonstrate the ability to update software for simulator equipment
Track participant usage of simulation lab
verificationMethods: Create a method to track usage of simulation lab
Track usage of simulation equipment
Create a method for tracking usage of simulation equipment

competencies.statement: Implement evaluation of simulation events
verificationMethods: Create a survey to evaluate each simulation event

competencies.statement: Demonstrate principles of supply chain
verificationMethods: Create a list of supply inventory
Monitor usage of supplies
Create a method to track usage of supplies

competencies.statement: Order supplies as needed
verificationMethods: Submit supply order requisition

competencies.statement: Understanding of LMS system
verificationMethods: Transcript of training

competencies.statement: Articulates the benefits of healthcare simulation
verificationMethods: Submit evidence of meeting with simulation stakeholders (educators)

categories.name: Advocate for evidence-based use of healthcare simulation

competencies.statement: Understands simulation methodologies, principles, and best practice
verificationMethods: Submit documentation of meeting with healthcare simulation users to instruct on healthcare simulation

categories.name: Advocate for Allied health staff education

competencies.statement: Knowledge of policies, procedures, and quality improvement initiatives in Allied Health
verificationMethods: Submit documentation of meeting with allied health leaders

categories.name: Collaborate with users of simulation lab

competencies.statement: Demonstrate ability to set up for simulation event based on collaboration with staff that requested the event
verificationMethods: Provide an example of simulation set up based on staff provided information

categories.name: Collaborate with Allied Health leaders and staff

competencies.statement: Identifies Allied health leadership
verificationMethods: Submit evidence of meeting with Allied health leaders

competencies.statement: Ensures collaboration and communication with Allied health staff and leadership
verificationMethods: Provide an example of collaboration with allied health staff and leadership

competencies.statement: Oversee daily operation of the simulation center
verificationMethods: Submit example of daily operation including scheduling and ensuring adequate supplies

competencies.statement: Provide technical support for simulation equipment and programs
verificationMethods: Submit an example of troubleshooting equipment issue

competencies.statement: Maintain safety and security of equipment and participants
verificationMethods: Submit an example of how security of equipment is completed
Submit an example of how participant safety (psychological safety) is promoted

categories.name: Oversee Allied Health Education at BHLex

competencies.statement: Oversees allied health staff development
verificationMethods: Submit an example of a method used to educate allied health staff

competencies.statement: Create a supportive learning environment
verificationMethods: Submit an example of a method used to create a supportive learning environment such as resources used

competencies.statement: Ensures education for quality and accreditation is completed
verificationMethods: Submit an example of ensuring compliance with accreditation standards and quality metrics

competencies.statement: Demonstrates ability to challenge conventional approaches
verificationMethods: Submit an example of an innovative solution that drives improvement

competencies.statement: Demonstrates creative problem solving
verificationMethods: Submit an example of a unique approach to overcome a challenge

categories.name: Collaborate with Allied health leaders to provide innovative opportunities for education

competencies.statement: Demonstrates ability to take in diverse perspectives
verificationMethods: Submit an example of a solution that utilized different perspectives

competencies.statement: Demonstrates the ability to adapt as needed
verificationMethods: Submit an example of adapting
